page.title: 13THE FORRES HIGHLAND GAMES
page.content: Every year many Scottish towns hold Highland Games.This year the Forres Highland Games will be held on Saturday 13 July in the local Grant Park.The games are organised by the amateur athletics association with the help of local clubs.The Forres Cycling Club are in charge of collecting entrance fees at the gate from an audience which will include both local people and tourists. All events are held in the open air and include the traditional items such as Highland Dancing, and the heavy events including tug of war, tossing the cabar (throwing a large wooden pole as far as possible) and hammer throwing. Famous heavy weight champions like Hamish Davidson come to compete in these events. Specialities of the Forres Games is the North of Scotland Hammer Throwing Championship.
